entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
